ComicInfo.Series: Loaded Bible: Blood of My Blood
ComicInfo.Summary: Jesus and Dracula fight to the death! When Sistine Centuria is healed by Jesus, she has her moment of redemption…and it will be her last. And while Jesus and his crew seem to have the upper hand, Dracula’s plan is in motion, and it seems impossible to stop. Find out the final fate of humanity in the dramatic, action-packed conclusion of the cult series!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-25 19:31:45. [CVDB945492] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 18:10:32. [Issue ID 2428439]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: David Talaski,Giuseppe Cafaro,Josh Rodriguez,Matthew Lesniewski,Mirka Andolfo,Stephanie Grey Glass
